snippet.title: Card City Nights 2  - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Card City Nights 2, the sequel to the adventure card game is launching on Steam September 1st!

Check out http://www.cardcitynights.com for more info.

iOS store page: https://itunes.apple.com/se/app/card-city-nights-2/id1292271577?mt=8
Android store page: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ludosity.ccn2
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/241300
